column2: "Hey there. I wanted to talk to you about something. Will you hear me out?"
"My name's Michaela, and I've got a bit of a problem."
"What? You don't think I look like I've got a real problem? Just who do you think you are, anyway?"
"Ugh, whatever. Just help me out, okay?"
"Hey. How is it going with what I asked you to do?"
"Don't make me wait too long. These things tend to eat you up inside."
"I've finally worked out what I want to do with my life."
"I'm going to quit ARKS and live off my good looks and honey voice."
"You still don't get it, do you? I'm going to be a singer."
